name: Nathan White
text: Always great service with great food. After this place being home to many personal memories including after game pizza nights and birthday parties, its impossible to say I've had an issue that has happened OR has happened and its never been a big deal. Always clean both inside and outside.

name: Jacob Hess
text: Awesome service and the people are super friendly! The place is clean and neat. Pizza was fresh and the deals are great! Oh yeah get the garlic butter it's great!

name: Mark Woolley
text: Great to eat in again.  Food is great and service was fast.  Love that place.

name: Elaine Holmes
text: I ordered a cauliflower crust pizza. It was crispy and the toppings were plentiful. I will be ordering this again!

name: Micheal Rogich Jr
text: Family atmosphere awesome restaurant if you love Italian you love Pizza Plus has a huge dining area for events keep everybody entertain recommend Pizza Plus

name: Paula Stiltner
text: Clean nice sever salad bar was stocked great and clean. We ate the bar always bringing out fresh pizza .we will go back again.

name: Barbara Hendricks
text: Thin crust chicken, mushroom pizza and salad were very good.  Pleasently surprised at the big chunks of chicken. Restaurant was clean and neat. First time visit, but will definitely be returning.

name: Shawn Horton
text: Awesome place to eat. Great service

name: Shannon oxendine
text: Have a good buffet and will add any pizza you want on there just ask prices are good on the buffet

name: bll lindsey
text: First time here. Assistant manager Kyle was very helpful and explained everything. Pizza was awesome. Will definitely go back when we are in the area.

name: GamingMama82
text: Very good food and clean

name: Ami Wright
text: Terrible experience! Took my daughter and 2 nieces there for a good pizza experience. But instead, we all ended up with food poison! Never getting my business again.

name: camie vandyke
text: Friendly, quick service. Great food and very clean.

name: Buster Hinkle
text: Have eaten there twice now and have been very please both times. Great food and great service. Waiter kept our drinks filled to the top and kept bringing out fresh food. Greatest pizza buffet we have eaten.

name: YardApe
text: Good ol Murder plus. Great food but awkward history.

name: Kimberly Viers
text: Yummy

name: Kathleen Blankenship
text: Very good food. Waitress r wonderful

name: Jasmine Bell
text: Always great food and employees

name: Kayla E Mitchell
text: It was a awesome place to eat at! We got our food really fast. The staff were very friendly.

name: Loucille Sparks
text: Very nice and friendly service. Good food at good prices.

name: Elaine Sutherland
text: Salad and hot bars were great ad usual

name: Martha White
text: Food was great, but there were  couple of things not so good. New workers need o listen to staff and customers  better.

name: Robert Stines
text: Went for the buffet,  hardly any pizza was on the bar. Over priced for little food.

name: Becka Large
text: I eat here all the time for my lunch. When I do come for my lunch my friend and I have to get our own drinks. Then today I went to go pay for my food and they charged me for some else's food. That was more then my own then the "assistant manager" if you wanna call him that would not even fix it.

name: Chelle Carini
text: Good deals on pizzas and drinks!

name: Bobby Murphy
text: Chelsea makes awesome food

name: Russ Black
text: Family of Meth Monsters.. I am not your kin.  They were nicer after they realized I'm not their pet Methhead, but not a moment before.   I wouldnt bring my family here

name: Wesley Ball
text: Has some of the best pizza around and customer service is pretty good.

name: Stephanie Bratcher
text: good food friendly servers clean place

name: Virgil Yoder
text: Salad bar is really good! Pizza is great as well. Very friendly and good service

name: Sharon Baisden
text: It's great food

name: Roger Coffey
text: Great place enjoyed the pizza here. The cheese they use is really good!!

name: Kenny Justice.
text: Good food,  good service

name: ThunderWolf39
text: Great food, great place to eat. Nice friendly people

name: Christopher Bowling
text: Poor food and service

name: David C
text: VERY disappointed. Called at 9:26 PM, too late for delivery.(the close at 10:00) Delicious pizza, but employees are not anxious to satisfy the customer and not trying to make as many sales as possible. They used to be Top Notch, unfortunately they have slipped significantly.

name: katt gillespie
text: Great food good service  awesome salad bar

name: Jarrell Lilly
text: A great place to eat and very understanding

name: Amos Ashby
text: Food safety concerns.

name: R Endicott
text: Yummy food.

name: Matthew Harrah
text: Great food and service.

name: Candace Asbury
text: Don’t answer the phone after 11:30

name: Robin Freeman
text: The wait staff is attentive and checks in with you often when you get the lunch buffet. They also inquire if you would like a specific pizza on the buffet.

name: Kelly Stanley
text: Wonderful staff and food...

name: James Alton
text: I get the spaghetti and meatballs (with garlic bread) a lot, mostly from delivery. Taste great and good portions.  Anything I have ordered has been great, (delivery or dine in) with friendly service.

name: Gabriel Bennett
text: Good pizza if it's thin crust.

name: Rebekah Palmer
text: Great pizza place! I like it way better than the local pizza hut. Pizza is always really good I love their supreme pizzas but they're plain cheese and pepperoni is good as well. I've ordered online from them a few times, smooth experience …More

name: Melvin Helton
text: Good folks, great pizza

name: Amanda Howell
text: Service is usually always good, as is the food

name: Jennifer Young
text: Great customer service! Manager was very courteous and organized with the staff.

name: Brian Fowler
text: Great service great food.

name: Jackie Johnson
text: Good service and good food

name: Kevin Ball
text: Me and my wife went there for lunch one day and the buffet was slow bringing out food and our drinks sat empty on our table for ten minutes while the server passed us multiple times. Also the window ledges had webs and dead bugs in them. Doubt ill be back

name: moose baldwin
text: Good food, fast service

text: The buffet is good sometimes and sometimes its not. I guess its luck of the draw when going there for lunch.

text: Prices are really cheap, hard to get refills unless you get them yourself, and if you request a pizza they'll put a half one out in the flavor you want and 90% of the time someone else grabs it and you don't get what you wanted
